t: CurlMix: What Happened To The Brand After Shark Tank? - Glam
s: July 23, 2023 - One of these brands was CurlMix. ... CurlMix is a Black-owned business based in Chicago that helps people master their curls with high-quality products made with simple ingredients. They sell shampoos, conditioners, masks, tools, serums, gels, and sets. Before "Shark Tank," the owners say the company had achieved $400,000 in sales in the last nine months and was being sold direct to consumers, as well as on Amazon...
